```{r, eval=FALSE}
pkgload::load_all()
# options(tt_latex_placement = "H")
inner <- "
 hlines = {white},
 vlines = {white},
 cell{1,6}{odd} = {teal7},
 cell{1,6}{even} = {green7},
 cell{2,4}{1,4} = {red7},
 cell{3,5}{1,4} = {purple7},
 cell{2}{2} = {r=4,c=2}{c,azure7},
"
mtcars[1:5, 1:4] |>
  #, align = "cccc" tt(theme = "void", align = "cccc", output = "latex") |>
  tt(theme = "void", align = "cccc", output = "latex") |>
  style_tabularray(inner = inner)
```
